text: gurusewaye rasakathathamage nawa niwasa indikala godanagili karmikayata durakathanayen amathu kanthawak, ayage niwasata mandak aathin dumriya gaman karana wita athi wana dedarim nisa ema niwasa selawimata bhajanaya wana bawata paminili kalaya.‚Äùeeka wenna baha.‚Äù

mema pelapotha 2015 warshaye 06 saha 10 shreniwalatada, 2016 wasaredi 07, 11 shreniwalatada, 2017 wasaredi 08 wani shreniyatada handunwa di thibena bawath, 2018 warshayedi palamu warata 09 shreniyata labadi athi mema pelapotha pasal lamun kihipa denekuta labi athi bawath demawupiyo prakasha karathi.

samastha lokayama piligath nirawachanayak idiripath kara aththe mahacharaya shrimath kenath wiyareya. 1987 di 13 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya pilibanda niranaye di mema nirawachanaya lankawe shreshtadhikaranaya wisin da bhawitha kara thibe.
tramp pramukha ripablikan palanaya yatathe kantha ayithiwasikamwalata balapam ella wanu athayi yanna udghoshakayange wishwasaya wi thibe.
mema thorathuru ek ras kirima sadaha samajika aayathana walata anubaddha wu kshethra niladharinge sahaya laba gane.

kese namuth kithuwasin 1215 di engalanthaye jon raju supathala "magna kata" pragnyapthiya athsan karamin rajuge balaya awama karamin niyojana prajathanthrawadaye bijaya ropanaya kirimata dayaka wu ayuru ithihasaye dak we. 17 wani siyawase di rajanduwadin ha janarajawadin lesin engalantha wasiya bedi giya ayuru menma anathuruwa ema kandayam deka wigs saha tori wemin matha yugaye di konsarwetiw ha lebar washayen bahupaksha prajathanthrawadaya dakwa wardhanaya wuye ema kriyadamaya thulin bawath apa amathaka nokala yuthuya.
